name: Sayed Muhammad Baker
about: I am currently serving as a CR of EMA BD

name: Md Mahamudul Hasan Mredul
about: Mr. Mredul is currently serving as the Deputy Country Representative for Erasmus Mundus Association Bangladesh (EMA-BD), a role he has held since 2022. Additionally, he works as the Newsletter Coordinator for the Communications & IT Unit of the Erasmus Mundus Association (EMA). His Erasmus Mundus journey began in 2020 when he pursued a Joint MSc Degree in Marine Environment and Resources. He started his studies at the University of Bordeaux, France, and continued at the University of the Basque Country, Spain, the University of Liege, Belgium, and the University of Rostock, Germany.Currently, Mr. Mredul is pursuing a PhD in Zoology at the University of British Columbia, Canada.

name: Tanzila Azad Mow
programName: Erasmus Mundus Masters Degree in Womens and Gender Studies
about: A extrovert with adaptability with any situation to manage, work on. Have encouragement to take challenges. Meeting new people and love to work as a team. Cheerful, optimistic person.

name: Md Tareq Khan Tipu
programName: Mediterranean Forestry and Natural Resources Management (MEDfOR)
position: Deputy Coordinator of Planning and Development
about: I am Tareq. I have completed my bachelor's and master's degrees in Forestry from Shahjalal University of Science and technology. Currently, I'm pursuing my second masters as an Erasmus student at the University of Lisbon. I am a research-oriented person and have capitalized on my skills in forest modeling. I am also engaged with the EMA-BD team to disseminate information regarding the Erasmus Mundus scholarship in biological Science especially prospects and experiences.

name: Md Imran Hossain
programName: MAIA - Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degree in Medical Imaging and Applications
position: Deputy Coordinator of Project & Event Management Team
about: I am an Erasmus+ Scholar. At present, I am studying Erasmus Mundus Joint Master in Medical Imaging and Applications (MAIA). In addition, I am the Erasmus Mundus Association Program Representative (PR) for MAIA. Earlier, I completed B.Sc. in Electrical and Electronic Engineering from United International University, Bangladesh. Travelling and sports are my favourite hobbies.

name: Arghya Kamol Roy
about: Articulating a sustainable process roadmap with the correct resources at various check points to follow up the execution system coupled with an intention of continuous improvement is the basis of any modern organization. Being a part of the Erasmus Mundus Association -Bangladesh team, our job is to transfer our vision into processes which can be designed, followed and improved continuously. Being a Mechanical Engineer by profession, this job of the coordinator of planning and development team, really motivates me because I can find a direct linkage of similar job pattern in almost everything that we do in our daily life, including designing a product. Its just the model of same age old perspective that we are adopting to implement in our various parts of life to visualize the outputs of our efforts in a more analytical way. This is my first year of engagement with EMA and I am very passionate about bringing small changes together with my team. I believe our small attempts can surely end up with a "BIG" rewards.

name: Fahmida Yeasmin
position: Deputy Coordinator of Students and Alumni

name: Shuvro Sen
about:
Being an Erasmus Mundus Awardee in the "Transition, Innovation, and Sustainability Environment" (TISE) program, my ultimate focusing point is how to make the sustainability concept more sustainable. TISE is a newly designed European program for mastering societal transition processes. 
In Bangladesh, I was employed as a Research Associate at BRAC University, Bangladesh. Moreover, I have done conducting research as a lead researcher at "The Friedrich-Ebert-Stiftung (FES)" in a research fellowship programme titled "Economy of Tomorrow". 
My main research areas are Corporate Social Responsibility, Business Ethics, and Fashion Industry.

name: Md Imran Hossain
programName: PSRS- Photonics for Security Reliability and Safety
position: Deputy Coordinator of IT and Social Media

name: Mohammad Hamid Al Muktadir
programName: EMMPHID (Erasmus Mundus Masters in Public Health in Disasters)
position: Coordinator of Event and Project Management Group
about: Around 4.5 years of professional experience in Humanitarian Response (particularly in Rohingya Refugee Crisis). Currently pursuing Masters in Public Health in Disaster with Erasmus Mundus Scholarship. Passionate about securing a PhD in any of my Public Health interests (Child nutrition, Maternal Nutrition, Youth Obesity).

name: Ahsan Rajib Promie
